title: "Neon Bot Retro"
content:
# Welcome to Neon Bot Retro

Neon Bot Retro is a website dedicated to all things retro-futuristic. Our website features a unique wallpaper that showcases a vintage illustration of a robot against a vibrant neon-colored background. 

Our website is the perfect destination for those who appreciate the nostalgia of past eras combined with the excitement and innovation of the future. We offer a variety of content, including articles, images, and videos that explore the world of retro-futurism. 

Whether you're a fan of classic sci-fi films or simply enjoy the aesthetic of bygone eras, Neon Bot Retro has something for everyone. So come join us on a journey through time and space, and experience the magic of retro-futurism for yourself!

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A retro-futuristic wallpaper featuring a vintage illustration of a robot, set against a neon-colored background."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
